title: Healthcare App
description: AI-powered tool exploring ethical considerations, featuring interactive case studies and resources for best practices.

title: Text to Image
description: A full-stack web app that transforms text prompts into AI-generated images, including secure user authentication with Firebase.

title: ChatGPT
description: A conversational AI chatbot built with React and Node, leveraging the OpenAI API to deliver human-like responses.

title: Resume Cover Letter Builder
description: An intuitive tool that helps users craft professional resumes and cover letters with live previews and export options.

title: Project A
description: A web app prototype showcasing modern JavaScript frameworks and server-side rendering for learning purposes.

title: Project B
description: A practice project demonstrating CRUD operations, REST API integration, and responsive UI with React and Node.

title: Project C
description: A sample application combining React, Express, and Node to illustrate full-stack development workflows.

title: Project D
description: An experimental platform for testing modern web technologies and best practices in deployment and authentication.
